report.title: Stomach Load
report.author: Psychotr0pik
report.bodytext: Well, i opened the bag containing the stuff then ,eyed ball it in a capsule that i ate at 13:00 /n /n At t+2 i noticed visuals on my comp /n /n At t+4 i couldnt stay anywhere so i decided so go to bed, and what i can say is that stomach discumfurt is so bad that it becomes hell. /n /n One intersting point about that stuff is when looking oneself face into a mirror, i was able to control the visual about my own face, focusing into my right eye. /n This Worked instantly and i could look like what i was feeling, sometimes dark visuals (like becoming some kind of dark monster) sometimes a beautiful boy. /n /n Well hard to explain, but it seemed my own spirit was sending orders through my right pupil, then receiving it and computing it into appropriate visuals ... /n Kinda funny no ??? /n /n After that my brain was really tired but the effect did not go away and i really wanted it to go out of my body. /n /n I felt like this substance was in every cells of my body, like some kind of intoxication (not very pleasant to me). /n /n At t+9 it became to go out, i went to sleep after having taken 1500 mg of aspirin and at 3:00 AM a big stomach cramp woke me up: waaaah please stop that!!! I wanna sleep !!!! /n /n 2CE said me bye bye and then i slept normally. /n /n Finally, this stuff is no fun, and it hurts to much to have a good trip. /n /n But what one can discover can be interesting, well, anyway the stuff went into toilets because i dont want to spoil a Saturday anymore like that.
